lustre/ptlrpc/ptlrpc_module.c

00036 
00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_RPC
00038 
00039 
00040 #include <obd_support.h>
00041 #include <obd_class.h>
00042 #include <lustre_net.h>
00043 #include <lustre_req_layout.h>
00044 
00045 #include "ptlrpc_internal.h"
00046 
00047 extern spinlock_t ptlrpc_last_xid_lock;
00048 #if RS_DEBUG
00049 extern spinlock_t ptlrpc_rs_debug_lock;
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 static __init int ptlrpc_init(void)
00053 {
00054         int rc;
00055 
00056         ENTRY;
00057 
00058         lustre_assert_wire_constants();
00059 #if RS_DEBUG
00060         spin_lock_init(&ptlrpc_rs_debug_lock);
00061 #endif
00062         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ptlrpc_all_services);
00063         mutex_init(&ptlrpc_all_services_mutex);
00064         mutex_init(&pinger_mutex);
00065         mutex_init(&ptlrpcd_mutex);
00066         ptlrpc_init_xid();
00067 
00068         rc = req_layout_init();
00069         if (rc)
00070                 RETURN(rc);
00071 
00072         rc = tgt_mod_init();
00073         if (rc)
00074                 GOTO(err_layout, rc);
00075 
00076         rc = ptlrpc_hr_init();
00077         if (rc)
00078                 GOTO(err_tgt, rc);
00079 
00080         rc = ptlrpc_request_cache_init();
00081         if (rc)
00082                 GOTO(err_hr, rc);
00083 
00084         rc = ptlrpc_init_portals();
00085         if (rc)
00086                 GOTO(err_cache, rc);
00087 
00088         rc = ptlrpc_connection_init();
00089         if (rc)
00090                 GOTO(err_portals, rc);
00091 
00092         ptlrpc_put_connection_superhack = ptlrpc_connection_put;
00093 
00094         rc = ptlrpc_start_pinger();
00095         if (rc)
00096                 GOTO(err_conn, rc);
00097 
00098         rc = ldlm_init();
00099         if (rc)
00100                 GOTO(err_pinger, rc);
00101 
00102         rc = sptlrpc_init();
00103         if (rc)
00104                 GOTO(err_ldlm, rc);
00105 
00106         rc = ptlrpc_nrs_init();
00107         if (rc)
00108                 GOTO(err_sptlrpc, rc);
00109 
00110         rc = nodemap_mod_init();
00111         if (rc)
00112                 GOTO(err_nrs, rc);
00113 
00114         RETURN(0);
00115 err_nrs:
00116         ptlrpc_nrs_fini();
00117 err_sptlrpc:
00118         sptlrpc_fini();
00119 err_ldlm:
00120         ldlm_exit();
00121 err_pinger:
00122         ptlrpc_stop_pinger();
00123 err_conn:
00124         ptlrpc_connection_fini();
00125 err_portals:
00126         ptlrpc_exit_portals();
00127 err_cache:
00128         ptlrpc_request_cache_fini();
00129 err_hr:
00130         ptlrpc_hr_fini();
00131 err_tgt:
00132         tgt_mod_exit();
00133 err_layout:
00134         req_layout_fini();
00135         return rc;
00136 }
00137 
00138 static void __exit ptlrpc_exit(void)
00139 {
00140         nodemap_mod_exit();
00141         ptlrpc_nrs_fini();
00142         sptlrpc_fini();
00143         ldlm_exit();
00144         ptlrpc_stop_pinger();
00145         ptlrpc_exit_portals();
00146         ptlrpc_request_cache_fini();
00147         ptlrpc_hr_fini();
00148         ptlrpc_connection_fini();
00149         tgt_mod_exit();
00150         req_layout_fini();
00151 }
00152 
00153 MODULE_AUTHOR("OpenSFS, Inc. <http://www.lustre.org/>");
00154 MODULE_DESCRIPTION("Lustre Request Processor and Lock Management");
00155 MODULE_VERSION(LUSTRE_VERSION_STRING);
00156 MODULE_LICENSE("GPL");
00157 
00158 module_init(ptlrpc_init);
00159 module_exit(ptlrpc_exit);
